page.title: 05Wrea Green Primary School(1)
page.content:
The full title of the school is :- RIBBY WITH WREA ENDOWED (C.E.) SCHOOL. It takes girls and boys from the ages of 4 to ll years. Most of the village primary age children come to the school and if it were closed would have to go at least 5Km to the nearest other school. The subjects we learn are :- Maths, English, History, Geography, Science, Art, and Sport. During the last term we make an "Interest Book" when we fill two books about any subject we choose.
The Sports we cover during a school year are :- P.E., Netball, Football, Swimming, Rounders,Athletics, Badminton and Cricket. Our school has about 90 - 100 pupils with 4 teachers.
